meanings.definition: Not able to be predicted or foreseen.
meanings.sent1: The weather in this city is so unpredictable.
meanings.sent2: Her mood swings are very unpredictable.
meanings.sent3: Trying to guess what my cat will do next is like trying to predict the unpredictable.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a rollercoaster, full of unpredictable twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The outcome of the game was truly unpredictable until the very end.

meanings.definition: Acting or occurring without prior warning or indication.
meanings.sent1: The sudden storm was so unpredictable.
meanings.sent2: The unpredictable nature of the stock market makes investing risky.
meanings.sent3: His unpredictable sense of humor always catches us off guard.
meanings.sent4: The unpredictable behavior of the wild animals kept us on edge.
meanings.sent5: The unpredictable arrival of unexpected guests surprised everyone at the party.
